casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kurt Allen COREY 189PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 14, 2018 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheboro, Kurt Allen Corey, for Corey, Kurt Allen. Sharon Patrick-Wilson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of November 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of November 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 17th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
